extension.name: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Filter
extension.description: Protect yourself against XSS attacks in form submissions.

releases.release: - More robust checking to handle upload fields and integers

- Static `detectXSS` function so that logic can be used by other extensions outside of the Event Options context - Events with the XSS Filter can now handle nested field data to an infinite level - Slight performance tweak if XSS is detected - Additional detection logic adding for `livescript` and `mocha` protocols
